attributes.review: i was super excited to download this app however as soon as i tried to do it i came across an issue, it simply wouldn’t download. i started doing fortnite dances to pass the time and after two weeks it finally installed on my phone. i couldn’t do anything while i waited for the app to download except fortnite dance so when it finally installed i was exhausted and ended up falling asleep. in my dreams i saw our orange god telling me he was proud of me and it caused me to have many nightmares. i think this app is great except i can’t sleep because i can’t get off of it because i just love it so much
